content: अर्भक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [According to <ls>Nir.</ls> अवहृतं भवति ह्रस्वं तस्मादर्भकः.] {@--1@} Small, minute, short; नमो महद्भ्यो नमोअर्भकेभ्यः <ls>Rv. 1. 27. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Weak, emaciated, lean. {@--3@} Foolish. {@--4@} Young, childish. {@--5@} Like, similar. --कः {@--1@} A boy, child; श्रुतस्य यायादयमंतमर्भकः <ls>R. 3. 21</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">25</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 67.</ls> {@--2@} The young of an animal. {@--3@} A fool, idiot.
